SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BinderController
Controller class for managing binder-related actions within the trading card collection application.
BinderMenuController
Controller class responsible for managing the interactions and actions related to the binder menu.
BinderMenuView
View class for the binder menu screen.
BinderModel
The BinderModel class represents a binder that holds a collection of trading cards.
BinderView
The BinderView class handles user interaction related to binders, such as prompting the user to input a binder name.
CardController
Controller class for managing card-related operations in the user's collection.
CardMenuController
Controller class for handling logic and user interactions in the Card Menu.
CardMenuView
GUI view class responsible for displaying the Card Menu screen.
CardModel
Represents a model for a trading card, encapsulating properties such as name, rarity, variant, value, quantity, and image path.
CardView
Provides methods for user interaction related to trading cards, such as creating and viewing card details and collections.
CollectionModel
The CollectionModel class manages a user's trading card collection, including individual cards, binders, and decks.
CollectorBinder
Represents a special type of binder designed for collectors, allowing only rare or legendary cards with non-normal variants to be inserted.
DeckController
Controller class responsible for managing operations related to decks.
DeckMenuController
Controller class responsible for managing interactions within the deck menu UI.
DeckMenuView
View class for the Deck Menu.
DeckModel
Model class representing a Deck of cards.
DeckView
View class responsible for handling user input and displaying output related to deck operations.
DialogUtil
Utility class for displaying standardized dialog messages using JOptionPane.
ImageUtils
Utility class for scaling ImageIcons to specified dimensions.
LuxuryBinder
The LuxuryBinder class is a specialized binder type that only accepts cards with non-normal variants.
Main
The entry point of the Trading Cards application.
MainFrame
The MainFrame class serves as the main application window for the Trading Card Inventory System.
MainMenuController
Controller responsible for managing the main menu interface and initializing other submenus (Card, Binder, and Deck menus).
MainMenuView
View component for the Main Menu screen of the Trading Card Inventory System.
NonCuratedBinder
The NonCuratedBinder class represents a binder type that accepts all cards without any filtering based on rarity or variant.
PauperBinder
The PauperBinder class represents a specialized binder that only accepts cards of rarity "Common" or "Uncommon".
RaresBinder
RaresBinder is a type of BinderModel that only accepts cards with rarity "Rare" or "Legendary".
